name: The Relic of the Shark-Folk
description: In the ancient undersea kingdom of the shark-folk, a mysterious relic is discovered, igniting a political drama as the kingdom's leaders clash over its potential. With the fate of their civilization at stake, seasoned explorer Marlin and Princess Sharla must navigate treacherous alliances and ancient secrets. As tension rises, they uncover truths that could either unite their people or plunge them into chaos.
